SoftLayer, an IBM Company | Houston, TX or Dallas TX

SoftLayer, an IBM Company, provides cloud infrastructure as a service from a growing number of data centers and network points of presence around the world. Our customers range from web startups to global enterprises. We are looking for talented systems engineers, skilled in networking, who are familiar with DevOps concepts and are interested in helping to build, evolve and operate rapidly-changing, resilient systems at scale.

Apply at http://tinyurl.com/h5mhs8a
